decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Design and Access statement; 378-DWG-000 P2 (OS MAP); 378-DWG-001 P2 (SITE PLAN);  378-DWG-002 P2 (EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN);  378-DWG-003 P2 (EXISTING FIRST FLOOR  PLAN); 378-DWG-004 P2 (EXISTING SECOND FLOOR PLAN); 378-DWG-005 P2 (EXISTING ROOF  PLAN); 378-DWG-010 P2 (EXISTING SECTIONS A-A); 378-DWG-011 P2 (EXISTING SECTIONS B-B); 378-DWG-020 P2 (EXISTING ELEVATIONS); 378-DWG-021 P2 (EXISTING ELEVATIONS); 378-DWG-022 P2 (EXISTING ELEVATIONS);  378-DWG-100 P2 (PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN);  378-DWG-101 P2 (PROPOSEDFIRST FLOOR  PLAN); 378-DWG-102 P2 (PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR PLAN); 378-DWG-103 P2 (PROPOSED ROOF PLAN); 378-DWG-104 P2 (PROPOSED SITE PLAN); 378-DWG-110 P2 (PROPOSED SECTIONS A-A); 378-DWG-111 P2 (PROPOSED SECTIONS B-B); 378-DWG-120 P2 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); 378-DWG-121 P2 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); 378-DWG-122 P2 (PROPOSED ELEVATIONS)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2016 (as amended) (or any subsequent amendment or new Order), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
description:
Single storey side/rear infill extension; rear roof extension; rear roof extension to outrigger; installation of three roof lights to front roof slope

Extension of the Second Floor closet wing, projection of the extension to match the neighbours.
